name: Coming Of Age
description:
Coming of age is hard, especially when there are millions of things on your mind at the same time. How does my body work while it deals with puberty, how to sort the thoughts in my head and ALL that pressure. 

Sometimes you're even affected by things you can't really control.

This project is an interactive experience which deals with a lot of different issues of puberty and all those tiny things that go through ones mind while taking one step closer to adulthood.
